title: Essential Services can use OFFICIAL ID to report to work during curfew
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police said that personnel attached to essential services, and staff attached to Foreign Missions can report to work during the curfew period by producing their official ID or an e-mail certification.
